root.name: Rock Band Track Pack: Classic Rock
root.description: The Rock Band Track Pack: Classic Rock was announced on March 23, 2009 and released on May 19, 2009 for the Xbox 360, Playstation 3, Wii, and Playstation 2 consoles. It originally retailed for $29.99 (averaging about $1.50 per song). A European release has not been announced.Like previous Rock Band Track Packs, the Classic Rock edition is a standalone game. Additionally, like the AC/DC Live and Track Pack 2 packs before it, the Classic Rock Pack also includes a code that Xbox 360 and Playstation 3 players can use to download the songs for free for use with Rock Band and Rock Band 2. The pack will allow Playstation 2 users to play these songs for the first time. At the time of its release, several tracks had not yet been made available for the Wii version of Rock Band 2.SetlistKey: Band Name "Song Title" - Year of Release Boston "Peace of Mind" - 1976 Boston "Rock and Roll Band" - 1976 Dead Kennedys "California Über Alles" - 1987 Dead Kennedys "Holiday in Cambodia" - 1987 Free "All Right Now" - 1970 George Thorogood the Destroyers "Bad to the Bone" - 1982 James Gang "Funk #49" - 1970 Jethro Tull "Hymn 43" - 1971 Lenny Kravitz "Let Love Rule" - 1989 Pat Benatar "Hit Me With Your Best Shot" - 1980 The Police "Can't Stand Losing You" - 1978 The Police "Truth Hits Everybody" - 1978 Rush "Closer to the Heart" - 1977 Rush "Red Barchetta" - 1981 Siouxsie and The Banshees "Kiss Them For Me" - 1991 Steve Miller Band "Take the Money and Run" - 1976 Steve Miller Band "The Joker" - 1973 The Stone Roses "Love Spreads" - 1994 The Who "Baba O'Riley" - 1971 The Who "Behind Blue Eyes" - 1971

similar_games.game: Guitar Hero III: Legends of Rock
